paper_abstract: In this paper, the distributed output regulation problem of linear multi-agent systems with parametric-uncertain leaders is considered. The existing distributed output regulation results with exactly known leader systems is not applicable. To solve the leader-following with unknown parameters in the leader dynamics, a distributed control law based on an adaptive internal model is proposed and the convergence can be proved.
paper_title: DISTRIBUTED OUTPUT REGULATION FOR LINEAR MULTI-AGENT SYSTEMS WITH UNKNOWN LEADERS
